mapper.insert:
select seq_cno.nextval from dual
insert into course( cno, trno, cname, ccode, ctotalnum, cstartdate, cenddate, crequireddate, cstatus, cprofessor, cmanager, ctrainingdate, ctrainingtime, ccreatedat ) values ( #{cno}, #{trno}, #{cname}, #{ccode}, #{ctotalnum}, #{cstartdate}, #{cenddate}, #{crequireddate}, #{cstatus}, #{cprofessor}, #{cmanager}, #{ctrainingdate}, #{ctrainingtime}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update course set trno=#{course.trno}, cname=#{course.cname}, ccode=#{course.ccode}, ctotalnum=#{course.ctotalnum}, cstartdate=#{course.cstartdate}, cenddate=#{course.cenddate}, crequireddate=#{course.crequireddate}, cstatus=#{course.cstatus}, cprofessor=#{course.cprofessor}, cmanager=#{course.cmanager}, ctrainingdate=#{course.ctrainingdate}, ctrainingtime=#{course.ctrainingtime}, cupdatedat=sysdate where cno=#{cno}
mapper.select: select t1.ecno, e.ecname, t1.cno, t1.cname, t1.cstatus, t1.cstartdate, t1.cenddate, t1.crequireddate from educenter e, ( select c.cno, r.ecno, r.trno, r.trname, c.cname, c.ccode, c.ctotalnum, c.cstartdate, c.cenddate, c.crequireddate, c.cstatus, c.cprofessor, c.cmanager, c.ccreatedat, c.cupdatedat, c.ctrainingdate, c.ctrainingtime, r.trcapacity, r.trenable from course c, trainingroom r where c.trno = r.trno ) t1 where e.ecno = t1.ecno and e.ecname=#{ecname}

select t1.ecno, e.ecname, t1.cno, t1.cname, t1.cstatus, t1.cstartdate, t1.cenddate, t1.crequireddate from educenter e, ( select c.cno, r.ecno, r.trno, r.trname, c.cname, c.ccode, c.ctotalnum, c.cstartdate, c.cenddate, c.crequireddate, c.cstatus, c.cprofessor, c.cmanager, c.ccreatedat, c.cupdatedat, c.ctrainingdate, c.ctrainingtime, r.trcapacity, r.trenable from course c, trainingroom r where c.trno = r.trno ) t1 where e.ecno = t1.ecno and e.ecname=#{ecname} and t1.cstatus='진행중'

select t1.ecno, e.ecname, t1.cno, t1.cname, t1.cstatus, t1.cstartdate, t1.cenddate, t1.crequireddate from educenter e, ( select c.cno, r.ecno, r.trno, r.trname, c.cname, c.ccode, c.ctotalnum, c.cstartdate, c.cenddate, c.crequireddate, c.cstatus, c.cprofessor, c.cmanager, c.ccreatedat, c.cupdatedat, c.ctrainingdate, c.ctrainingtime, r.trcapacity, r.trenable from course c, trainingroom r where c.trno = r.trno ) t1 where e.ecno = t1.ecno and e.ecname=#{ecname} and t1.cstatus='진행예정'

select t1.ecno, e.ecname, t1.cno, t1.cname, t1.cstatus, t1.cstartdate, t1.cenddate, t1.crequireddate from educenter e, ( select c.cno, r.ecno, r.trno, r.trname, c.cname, c.ccode, c.ctotalnum, c.cstartdate, c.cenddate, c.crequireddate, c.cstatus, c.cprofessor, c.cmanager, c.ccreatedat, c.cupdatedat, c.ctrainingdate, c.ctrainingtime, r.trcapacity, r.trenable from course c, trainingroom r where c.trno = r.trno ) t1 where e.ecno = t1.ecno and e.ecname=#{ecname} and t1.cstatus='진행완료'
